title: The Dull Princess and the Black Cat’s Amicable Engagement Annulment - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Calm Protagonist   Engagement   Female Protagonist   Inferiority Complex   Kind Love Interests   Magic   Overpowered Protagonist   Royalty   Transformation Ability   Witches   Wizards
author: Mayumi Rino   真弓りの
description:
Always compared to her younger sister Marietta, who was known to be a matchless beauty; the “Dull Princess” Selen, the duke’s daughter was brought up with ridicule. Hearing her fiancé say, “I want to make Marietta the Queen”, she decided to break the engagement by herself.

With the black cat familiar she borrowed from the “Leader of the Ice Mages”, Viol, she aims for an amicable engagement annulment.>
